009package Ch03_PointOperations;
010
011import ij.ImagePlus;
012import ij.plugin.filter.PlugInFilter;
013import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
014import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramMatcher;
015import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramPlot;
016import imagingbook.common.histogram.HistogramUtils;
017import imagingbook.common.histogram.PiecewiseLinearCdf;
018
019/**
020 * Adapts image intensities to match a piecewise-linear histogram.
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 * 
024 * @see HistogramMatcher
025 * @see HistogramPlot
026 * @see PiecewiseLinearCdf
027 */
028public class Match_To_Piecewise_Linear_Histogram implements PlugInFilter { 
029        
030        @Override
031        public int setup(String arg0, ImagePlus im) {
032                return DOES_8G;
033        }
034        
035        @Override
036        public void run(ImageProcessor ipA) {
037                // get histogram of original image
038                int[] hA = ipA.getHistogram();
039                
040                (new HistogramPlot(hA, "Histogram A")).show();
041                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(hA), "Cumulative Histogram A")).show();
042                
043                // -------------------------
044                int[] ik = {28, 75, 150, 210};
045                double[] Pk = {.05, .25, .75, .95};
046                PiecewiseLinearCdf pLCdf = new PiecewiseLinearCdf(256, ik, Pk);
047                // -------------------------
048                
049                double[] nhB = pLCdf.getPdf();
050                nhB = HistogramUtils.normalizeMax(nhB);
051                (new HistogramPlot(nhB, "Piecewise Linear")).show();
052                (new HistogramPlot(pLCdf, "Piecewise Linear Cumulative")).show();
053                
054                HistogramMatcher m = new HistogramMatcher();
055                int[] F = m.matchHistograms(hA, pLCdf);
056                
057//              for (int i = 0; i < F.length; i++) {
058//                      IJ.log(i + " -> " + F[i]);
059//              }
060                
061                ipA.applyTable(F);
062                int[] hAm = ipA.getHistogram();
063                (new HistogramPlot(hAm, "Histogram A (mod)")).show();
064                (new HistogramPlot(HistogramUtils.cdf(hAm), "Cumulative Histogram A (mod)")).show();
065        }
066
067}
068
